item.title: Whats wrong with my code :o
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

				case 592:
				if (playerLevel[15] >= 30)
				{ //30+ herblore
				DeleteItem(227, 3);
				StartAnimation(1458);
				StillGfx(68, absY, absX);
				AddItem(127, 1);
				AddSkillXP(4500, 15);
				SendMessage("You create a potion of healing");
				}
				break;
			
				case 3186:
				if (playerLevel[15] >= 60)
				{ //60+ Herblore
				DeleteItem(91, 2);
				StartAnimation(1458);
				StillGfx(68, absY, absX);
				AddSkillXP(95000, 15);
				AddItem(113, 1);
				SendMessage("You create a strength potion"); //bookmark
				}
				break;
				
				 
				case 618:
				if (playerLevel[15] > 85)
				{
				DeleteItem(221, 27);
				StartAnimation(1656);
				StillGfx(59, absY, absX);
				AddSkillXP(350000, 15);
				SendMessage("You mix a few ingredients and it explodes into a Super Strength Potion!");
				AddItem(2440, 1);
				}
            			break;

					
				case 6644:
				if (playerLevel[15] < 30)
				{ //less 30- herblore
				DeleteItem(227, 3);
				StartAnimation(1458);
				StillGfx(68, absY, absX);
				AddSkillXP(350, 15);
				AddItem(131, 1);
				SendMessage("You create a lesser potion of healing");
				}
				break;

There…

item.title: Whats wrong with my code :o
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

Hey i keep getting 100 errors on this herblore system i am making: Here is the code

[code] case 592:
if (playerLevel[15] >= 30); //30+ herblore
DeleteItem(227, 3);
StartAnimation(1458);
StillGfx(68, absY, absX);
AddItem(127, 1);
AddSkillXP(4500, 15);
SendMessage(“You create a potion of healing”);
}
break;

			case 3186:
			if (playerLevel[15] >= 60); //60+ Herblore
			DeleteItem(91, 2);
			StartAnimation(1458);
			StillGfx(68, absY, absX);
			AddSkillXP(95000, 15);
			AddItem(113, 1);
			SendMessage("You create a strength potion"); //bookmark
			}
			break;
			
			 
			case 618:
			if (playerLevel[15] > 85);
			DeleteItem(221, 27);
			StartAnimation(1656);
			StillGfx(59, absY, absX);
			AddSkillXP(350000, 15);
			SendMessage("You mix a few ingredients and it explodes into a Super Strength Potion!");
			AddItem(2440, 1);
			}
        			break;

				
			case 6644:
			if (playerLevel[15] < 30); //less 30- herblore
			DeleteItem(227, 3);
			StartAnimation(1458);
			StillGfx(68, absY, absX);
			AddSkillXP(350, 15);
			AddItem(131, 1);
			SendMessage("You create a lesser potion of healing");
			}
			break;[/code]

Help would be GREATLY appreciated
I’ll even give some credit
